abstract: Dismal results from the first-quarter earnings of AT&T and Verizon indicate a larger slowdown in the wireless industry.
snippet: Dismal results from the first-quarter earnings of AT&T and Verizon indicate a larger slowdown in the wireless industry.
lead_paragraph: From new restaurant openings to an improving job market, there are signs everywhere that the economy is flickering back to life.

headline.main: Prepaid Is the New Wireless Battleground
